Some seniors do get a discount for a usage-based or even pay-as-you-go car insurance program. This can be a good option for a mature or experienced driver. Even if you take an accident-prevention course or defense driving course, you could qualify for a discount. Driving a safer car is also a major element. It is essential to know if anti-theft devices, airbags and anti-lock brakes can earn you a discount.
